No. 5767)) Sub:: Inspection of Structures, Retaining Walls and RE walls on National Highways A few incidents of premature failure of Structures, Retaining Walls & RE walls in National Highway projects have been reported recently endangering the safety of road users. 2_ Negligence in construction  methodology & safety aspects results in man-made disasters posing threat to human lives in addition to the economic losses, hence, it is essential to ensure that prescribed guidelines are followed in design and construction of all structures as flyovers/ ROBs/ VUPs / PUPs etc. and their approaches: The relevant Quality Control mechanism is strictly adhered to while undertaking construction: 3_ In view of above, all ROs & PDs are hereby directed to ensure that all completed as well as under construction structures & their approaches are examined by the concerned PDs & AEs/ IEs in respective jurisdictions with specific emphasis on design/ safety of structures and adequacy/ adherence of the construction methodology so as to ensure that no failure takes place. 4 The confirmation for all such structures having been examined, project wise, must be loaded in Data Lake by 21.09.2020. 5 This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority.
